<h3 id="X31445">X(31445) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, SPIEKER, STAMMLER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(2*a^3+(b+c)*a^2-2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a-(b+c)^3)  :  :
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; R cos A + s cot(A/2) : :
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; 4 s^2 (a - b - c) + a (a^2 - b^2 - c^2) : :
<br>
<b>
X(31445) = X(1)+3*X(3929) = X(1)-3*X(16418) = X(8)+3*X(11111) = X(10)-3*X(5325) = 5*X(1698)-X(9579) = 5*X(1698)-3*X(17528) = X(3295)-3*X(4512) = 5*X(3616)-9*X(17561) = 7*X(3624)-3*X(4654) = X(3927)-3*X(3929) = X(3927)+3*X(16418) = X(6850)-3*X(26446) = X(9579)-3*X(17528) = 2*X(13624)-3*X(28466)
</b>
<p>

<p>
X(31445) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 3927}, {3, 7330}, {355, 6868}, {958, 12514}, {3560, 26921}, {3929, 16418}<br>
X(31445) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6147, 1125), (6917, 9956)<br>
X(31445) = anticomplement of X(3824)<br>
X(31445) = X(3927)-of-anti-Aquila triangle<br>
X(31445) = X(12161)-of-2nd Zaniah triangle<br>
X(31445) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 3929, 3927), (3, 9, 5044), (37,58,37593), (3927, 16418, 1)<br>
</p>
